DESCRIPTION: Generic Record Header

FIELD: LINE OF 50 KM RES NODES and associated data

DESCRIPTION: UTC time of line of 50 km nodes
Azimuth angle bearing of nadir track velocity

FIELD: 50 KM RESOLUTION NODE and associated data

DESCRIPTION: 50 km node number as used in the PGF (ref AD-2]), i.e., (10 to -10) for the left swath in the left-to-right order, (-10 to 10) for the right swath in the left-to-right order, 0 corresponding to the mid swath position in both swaths.
Swath (right or left)
Latitude (-90 to 90 deg)
Longitude (0 to 360 deg)
Height of atmowphere used
Atmospheric loss per unit length of atmosphere

FIELD: 50 KM RESOLUTION TRIPLET COMPONENT and associated data

DESCRIPTION: Smoothed to 50 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) sigma zero values
Smoothed to 50 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) kp values (values between 0 and 1)
Smoothed to 50 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) incidence angle values
Smoothed to 50 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) azimuth angle values
Flag related to the quality of the Kp estimate (ref. Ad-2)
Flag related to the usability of the averaged value (ref. Ad-2)
Flag related to the use of synthetic data in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to the quality of the used of synthetic data in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2)  (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to orbit/atticute quality in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2)  (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to solar array reflection contamination in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2)  (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to telemtry quality in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to the presence of extrapolated reference functions in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to the use of measurements over land in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2)  (value between 0 and 1)
